item.title: Kubernetes cert-manager
item.description: I developed an admission webhook for Akri, twice (Golang, Rust). I naively followed other examples for the generation of the certificates, created a 1.20 cluster and broke that process. I’d briefly considered using cert-manager recently but quickly abandoned the idea thinking it would be onerous and unnecessary complexity for little-old-me. I was wrong. It’s excellent and I recommend it highly. I won’t reproduce the v1beta1 and v1 examples from the Stackoverflow question as they should be self-explanatory.
